CustomField.description: Setting this flag to true allows previous approvals from the finalized cart to be included in the check for auto-reapproval, otherwise re-approvals start from scratch on the new cart object.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Setting this flag to true allows previous approvals from the finalized cart to be included in the check for auto-reapproval, otherwise re-approvals start from scratch on the new cart object.
CustomField.label: Enable Auto-Reapproval On Finalized Cart
